---
name: documentation
about: A template that should be used when creating doc task in GitHub Issues.
title: ''
labels: documentation
assignees: ''

---


# Doc Description
- Describe the tool, library, framework, etc. that you want to explore and explain why it is needed for the project.  

# Subtasks
- [ ] List subtasks here.
- [ ] Make use of checkbox for easy progress tracking.

# Scope

* [ ] Create new documentation
* [ ] Update existing documentation
* [ ] Add screenshots/diagrams
* [ ] Improve structure/navigation
